ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Bad faith)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (BAD FAITH) in order to curb the potential for abuse of the family immigration class by introducing measures to clarify what constitutes a bad faith relationship.
